alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Teton County through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Teton Pass, or 13 miles west of Jackson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Teton Pass around 350 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wilson, Jackson and Rafter J Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
